</title>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** 1
</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Base Weapon** [Longsword](/Weapons.aspx?ID=31)
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Perception** +11; precise vision 30 feet, imprecise hearing 30 feet

**Communication** speech ([Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1) and four other common languages)

**Skills** [Performance](/Skills.aspx?ID=14) +15

**Int** +2, **Wis** +2, **Cha** +4

**Will** +13 (+17 against attempts to quiet its singing)

</column>

---        

A _singing sword_ is a _+1 striking [longsword](/Weapons.aspx?ID=31)_ imbued with the consciousness of a boisterous bard, and therefore constantly sings at all times. A _singing sword_ can’t stop singing and in fact communicates in no way other than by singing. A successful [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=6) or [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) check against its Will DC can convince it to quiet its singing to a whisper for 10 minutes, or 20 minutes on a critical success, though it quickly grows displeased at anyone who attempts this repeatedly. The _singing sword_ can spend its actions to attack on its own, with the effects of a [_dancing_](/Equipment.aspx?ID=293) weapon’s activation, except that its attack modifier is +12. Additionally, it can perform the following activations; each casts a composition spell and follows all the usual rules for [compositions](/Traits.aspx?ID=31).
